title: Optimal Packing & Hitting
abstractText:
This project is rooted in Ergodic Theory and Dynamical Systems, but 
also aims to have significant impact on Geometry.
The main novelty will be to exploit techniques from
Ergodic Optimization, a relatively new branch of Ergodic Theory and Dynamical Systems,
to prove Optimal Hitting results in a symbolic dynamics context,
and certain conjectures in Optimal Packing.
